page.title: 14CLUBS IN DIPTON.
page.content: ARMY CADETS by EMMA FAIRLESS. There are 17 boys in Harelaw Cadets. Aged 13 to 18yrs. 40% of the boys go into the Armed Services.Highest rank in the Cadets is Colonel.They do the Duke of Edinburgh Awards every other Thursday.They all wear Army uniforms. {Ruth Griffin's brother is a Boy Scout. {Scout Activities are;Camping,Cooking, {Hiking,Sailing,Canoeing,Swimming,Doing {Gang Shows,First Aid.They meet weekly, {when their uniforms are checked by the {Scout Leader for neatness & tidiness.} {Subscriptions are 30p per week.} Amanda Hinchcliffe's Girl Guide pack meets every Wed. at 5,45pm.They play Traffic Lights or Mrs.Brown's Shopping Basket.They go to Camp in July with their Leader,Mrs.Lisle.In Sept.we go to a Rally in York to celebrate the 75th.anniversary of the founding of the Movement by Lady Baden Powell.
